Cube.name: ipeds_finance_financials
Cube.Annotation: IPEDS is the Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System. It is a system of interrelated surveys conducted annually by the U.S. Department of Educationâ€™s National Center for Education Statistics (NCES). IPEDS gathers information from every college, university, and technical and vocational institution that participates in the federal student financial aid programs.

Measure.name: Endowment Value
Measure.Annotation: Endowment value at fiscal year end

Measure.name: Median Endowment Value
Measure.Annotation: Endowment value at fiscal year end

Measure.name: Federal Grants And Contracts
Measure.Annotation: Federal operating grants and contracts are revenues from federal government agencies that are for specific research projects or other types of programs and that are classified as operating revenues. Examples are research projects and similar activities for which amounts are received or expenditures are reimbursable under the terms of a grant or contract.

Measure.name: Median Federal Grants And Contracts
Measure.Annotation: Federal operating grants and contracts are revenues from federal government agencies that are for specific research projects or other types of programs and that are classified as operating revenues. Examples are research projects and similar activities for which amounts are received or expenditures are reimbursable under the terms of a grant or contract.

Measure.name: Investment Income
Measure.Annotation: Revenues derived from the institution's investments, including investments of endowment funds. Such income may take the form of interest income, dividend income, rental income or royalty income and includes both realized and unrealized gains and losses.

Measure.name: Median Investment Income
Measure.Annotation: Revenues derived from the institution's investments, including investments of endowment funds. Such income may take the form of interest income, dividend income, rental income or royalty income and includes both realized and unrealized gains and losses.

Measure.name: Local Grants
Measure.Annotation: Grants by local government are for scholarships and fellowships that were funded by local government.

Measure.name: Median Local Grants
Measure.Annotation: Grants by local government are for scholarships and fellowships that were funded by local government.

Measure.name: Local Grants And Contracts
Measure.Annotation: Local operating grants and contracts are revenues from local governmental agencies that are for specific research projects or other types of programs and that are classified as operating revenues. Examples are research projects and similar activities for which amounts are received or expenditures are reimbursable under the terms of a grant or contract.

Measure.name: Median Local Grants And Contracts
Measure.Annotation: Local operating grants and contracts are revenues from local governmental agencies that are for specific research projects or other types of programs and that are classified as operating revenues. Examples are research projects and similar activities for which amounts are received or expenditures are reimbursable under the terms of a grant or contract.

Measure.name: Other Federal Grants
Measure.Annotation: Other federal awards are expenditures for scholarships and fellowships, excluding Pell grants, that were funded from federal government agencies. This includes Supplemental Educational Opportunity Grants (SEOG), and the Leveraging Educational Assistance Partnership (LEAP) Program, but not loans or College Work Study Program.

Measure.name: Median Other Federal Grants
Measure.Annotation: Other federal awards are expenditures for scholarships and fellowships, excluding Pell grants, that were funded from federal government agencies. This includes Supplemental Educational Opportunity Grants (SEOG), and the Leveraging Educational Assistance Partnership (LEAP) Program, but not loans or College Work Study Program.

Measure.name: Pell Grants
Measure.Annotation: Pell grants represents the gross amount of Pell grants disbursed or otherwise made available to recipients by the institution.

Measure.name: Median Pell Grants
Measure.Annotation: Pell grants represents the gross amount of Pell grants disbursed or otherwise made available to recipients by the institution.

Measure.name: Private Grants
Measure.Annotation: Private operating grants and contracts are revenues from nongovernmental agencies and organizations that are for specific research projects or other types of programs and that are classified as operating revenues. Examples are research projects and similar activities for which amounts are received or expenditures are reimbursable under the terms of a grant or contract.

Measure.name: Median Private Grants
Measure.Annotation: Private operating grants and contracts are revenues from nongovernmental agencies and organizations that are for specific research projects or other types of programs and that are classified as operating revenues. Examples are research projects and similar activities for which amounts are received or expenditures are reimbursable under the terms of a grant or contract.

Measure.name: Research Total
Measure.Annotation: Research total expenses is the sum of all operating expenses associated with activities specifically organized to produce research outcomes and commissioned by an agency either external to the institution or separately budgeted by an organizational unit within the institution. The category includes institutes and research centers and individual and project research. This function does not include nonresearch sponsored programs (e.g., training programs).

Measure.name: Median Research Total
Measure.Annotation: Research total expenses is the sum of all operating expenses associated with activities specifically organized to produce research outcomes and commissioned by an agency either external to the institution or separately budgeted by an organizational unit within the institution. The category includes institutes and research centers and individual and project research. This function does not include nonresearch sponsored programs (e.g., training programs).

Measure.name: State Grants And Contracts
Measure.Annotation: Grants by state government includes expenditures for scholarships and fellowships that were funded by the state such as the state share of SSIG.

Measure.name: Median State Grants And Contracts
Measure.Annotation: Grants by state government includes expenditures for scholarships and fellowships that were funded by the state such as the state share of SSIG.

Measure.name: Total Assets
Measure.Annotation: Total assets is the sum of current and noncurrent assets

Measure.name: Median Total Assets
Measure.Annotation: Total assets is the sum of current and noncurrent assets

Measure.name: Total Expenses
Measure.Annotation: Total expenses and other deductions represents the sum of operating and non-operating expenses and deductions.

Measure.name: Median Total Expenses
Measure.Annotation: Total expenses and other deductions represents the sum of operating and non-operating expenses and deductions.

Measure.name: Total Liabilities
Measure.Annotation: Total liabilities is the sum of current and noncurrent liabilities

Measure.name: Median Total Liabilities
Measure.Annotation: Total liabilities is the sum of current and noncurrent liabilities

Measure.name: Total Revenue
Measure.Annotation: "Total revenues and other additions represents the sum of all revenues and other additions to net assets, including operating and nonoperating revenues and other revenues and additions.

Measure.name: Median Total Revenue
Measure.Annotation: "Total revenues and other additions represents the sum of all revenues and other additions to net assets, including operating and nonoperating revenues and other revenues and additions.

Measure.name: Median Total Salaries
Measure.Annotation: Median total expenses for salaries and wages.

Measure.name: Tuition And Fees
Measure.Annotation: Tuition and fees are revenues from all tuition and fees assessed against students (net of refunds and discounts and allowances) for educational purposes.

Measure.name: Median Tuition And Fees
Measure.Annotation: Tuition and fees are revenues from all tuition and fees assessed against students (net of refunds and discounts and allowances) for educational purposes.

Measure.name: Endowment 20th Percentile
Measure.Annotation: Only including endowments with non-empty positive value

Measure.name: Endowment 40th Percentile
Measure.Annotation: Only including endowments with non-empty positive value

Measure.name: Endowment 60th Percentile
Measure.Annotation: Only including endowments with non-empty positive value
